reviews.text: Very delicious !!

Gem in the neighbourhood, doesnâ€™t get anywhere near the recognition it deserves.

While you may be able to get skewers from the stalls a couple blocks away, Mr Qâ€™s delivers the whole experience. Everything tasted really good and well prepared, hospitality was great. For the whole experience it is very affordable.

Been here a few times now and it doesnâ€™t disappoint.

Ben is a great host and helped make everything easier and cleared up any questions.

Come give it a try, who doesnâ€™t love meat on a stick?

I'll start with the positive: the staff was very friendly and the atmosphere was nice.
Unfortunately, the food was way too overpriced. Mainly, I ordered the éº»è¾£é¦™é”… . 36 dollars, and there was very little beef, lotus root, and seafood. It was literally almost all cauliflower. An absolute ripoff. Look at the photo for proof. Go to Flushing for a more authentic and affordable experience.
Been coming since they opened. Beef soup are fire with spice , watermelon slush is fireeeeeee, popcorn chicken fireeeeee. Food always hits the spot.
Skewers were fine but this chicken was unacceptable.
Over the past five months, I have noticed a significant price increase. The portion size of the ice rice has become notably smaller. I am dissatisfied with these changes

Good place, but the food need to be improved,  need more flavor,  to blend.
Make it more taste like the real chinese  bbq.
I am going to try one more time later
The food was delicious, especially the popcorn chicken. The service was also very good, and we will be going there often.

This was the worst dinner I've ever had there with my kids. They forced someone else's order on us, saying it was ours. It was the order I hated the most, and we took it. But there was one dish that we just asked the price for, and they made it for us. We had no choice but to pay for it. It was our first time there, but it will also be our last time. I hope others will confirm with them again and again when placing an order, otherwise this situation will happen, as if they are forcing us to buy or sell.
staff so sweet, love the food
Food was fantastic!! You can tell it was cooked with love.
I really love the place it really reminds me of China because the design and the smell I'm glad they also add music to make the place better and it super quiet here and it's amazing and mostly cheat
The skewers mostly tasty, i love the scallion pancake, the fried bun good, the place full aircon, so comfortable

I donâ€™t usually leave reviews but I had to for this spot because it is so damn good and such a gem. Iâ€™ve tried so many bbq skewer spots in Brooklyn and flushing but this place takes the crown. Their skewers are grilled to perfection and the spices are just right. I love the beef, gizzard, and chicken skin skewer the best. The garlic grilled oysters were soooo good too. I came on a Saturday night with my husband and it was so quiet (only one other table). I really hope business picks up soon and more people find out about them so they can stay in business and then I can keep coming!! Highly recommended - run, donâ€™t walk !!!

Very delicious!! Iâ€™m from elmhurst and originally get skewers from the trucks but I decided to order from here on uber eats. Every thing was super flavorful and I enjoyed every skewer. Iâ€™m going to order again soon!

I know this place from their Brooklyn location and I'm glad to say they were able to maintain the same quality and flavor.

This new location is clean, spacious, and well lit. Really happy to be able to eat my lotus root skewers here in Queens
The only place that took almost 40mins to cook mala and serve it without rice, hella salty highly not recommend

Mr Q BBQ Grill offers a fantastic Chinese skewer BBQ experience. The selection of skewers is impressiveâ€”from savory meats to flavorful vegetables, all seasoned just right with bold spices that pack a punch. Everything was grilled to perfection and came out hot and juicy.

The atmosphere is lively and casual, making it a great spot to hang out with friends or enjoy a relaxed meal. The staff were friendly and efficient, and the service was quick even during busy hours.

If you're a fan of Chinese-style skewers and smoky, spicy flavors, this place is definitely worth checking out. Iâ€™ll be coming back for sure!
Delicious food in a relaxed atmosphere. Great service as well. Definitely recommend trying as many of the skewers as you can.
Best skewers place in queens
Most best BBQ area, the â€œEight Treasure Ice Riceâ€& â€œMilk Tea Ice Riceâ€ & BBQ & the popcorn chicken was amazing! Recommend coming here!!
Yummy Chinese skewers! Good addition to the area and stays open late. Friendly staff :)

The food is absolutely delicious! full of flavor and beautifully prepared! The service is outstanding and impressively fast. The young woman who helped us was incredibly sweet and friendly, making the experience even better. The place is also very clean and well organized, which adds to the overall comfort. Highly recommended! I will come back soon
Service was good, including the workers. The food was yummy and very local!
The oyster was the best!

Really good! Been here a few times now. Everything was tasty.

Nice spot for some meat on a stick haha.
Try the bacon and mushroom . It's good

I always wanted that chinese bbq flavor that I had back in China and Mr. Q's replicates it almost exactly. The skewers are very flavorful and definitely not too expensive. Coming here with 3 other friends can get you guys full with just $100s.
I recommend asking for additional spicy powder on the side, and my favorite items are the steak skewer, Chinese rice cake ,bacon mushroom, and the big eggplant (has loads of garlic). The milk tea here are just as good as the boba shops!!
The barbecue tastes great and the service is excellent.

Delicious food and great service! This place offers traditional Chinese style barbecue, perfect for those who love grilled dishes. My favorite is the iced rice, which goes perfectly with the barbecue! The prices are also quite reasonable. Highly recommended!
Awesome!ğŸ¥³ Very delicious! Canâ€™t believe we found  such a good Chinese BBQ!ğŸ«¢ So surprised!ğŸ˜
Everything is just perfect, the environment and foods. The workers are nice and friendly. Definitely will visit again!!
